title: Netflix Redesign
description: I focused on the main interaction projects's hover and click. I tried to make it as smooth as possible, using the width of elements and scale. Additionally, I played with the small gallery under the main part, using a grid and translate to make it smoothly follow the cursor.
why: Build during a one day session of coding in October 2022, it was a little test to recreate NETFLIX website. I entirely based my coding on the design of Sergey Razgulyaev (https://www.pinterest.fr/pin/112801165658901653/).
